name: Under the Veranda
description:
Under the Veranda is Amanda's popular Block-of-the-Month pattern, available in print for the first time!  It is shown in two different color stories, but fabric diagrams are included so that you can also make up your own!  There is a little bit of everything in this sampler: Flying geese, brick blocks, a Dresden Plate, bargello, appliqué and more!

Quilt assembly instructions included.

22 pages, full-color

name: Color Essentials: Crisp and Vibrant Quilts
description:
The essential reference on quilting with color…

Perfect go-to guide for quilters of any skill level.

Create 12 quilts (9 pieced quilts, and a pillow, placemat, and runner) with dynamic style.

Designs use precut strips, squares, and fat quarter bundles.

All books from will be signed unless requested otherwise.

name: Modern Holiday
description:
Dress up your home in something fresh for the holidays! These quilts and holiday decorations from designer/blogger Amanda Murphy take Christmas in a bright new direction that updates the traditional reds and greens with blues, pinks, and whites. 18 festive projects include 9 quilts and 9 home decorations: seasonal pillows, a tree skirt, advent calendar, Christmas stocking, and more. 

Note: Books from this website will come signed unless you prefer to opt out of this option.

name: Charmed 1: Diamond Runner
description: Diamond Runner is a charm-pack friendly pattern that is quick to sew.  It is printed on glossy card stock in full-color.  Prints shown are from my Topiary collection coming out in January of 2014.

name: Soda Pop!
description: Soda Pop measures 48’’ x 66’’ and features Amanda's “Bonjour, Mon Ami” collection for Blend Fabrics, her "Modern Blossoms" OESD/Brewer embroidery collection, and Robert Kaufman Kona cottons and blenders. Directions for a small table runner project are included. This pattern is a Brewer exclusive designed to celebrate Modern Blossom's debut with Brewer Sewing, but it is also offered here for people who might not live near a shop.

name: Whirl
description: This 54-1/2’’ x 70-1/2’’ design is a great opportunity to play with a variety of fabrics. Use a fun feature print or embroidery motifs for the cornerstones of the sashing. The Seaglass color story from Amanda's Bella collection , as well as some V and Co. Simply Color prints, are shown. Motifs from Amanda's "Modern Blossoms" collection for Brewer are also shown.

name: Manhattan
description: Display your favorite embroideries or feature prints in this jelly-roll- friendly quilt measuring 62’’ x 79’’. The example on the cover features Amanda's “Bonjour, Mon Ami” collection for Blend Fabrics, her Brewer/OESD "Modern Blossoms" embroidery collection, and Kona cotton.

name: A Modern Table
description: Gather your favorite scraps to frame blocks cut from favorite feature prints or embroidery designs to make a (20’ x 50’’) table runner and 4 (13-1/4’’ x 16-1/2’’) placemats. Motifs from Amanda's "Modern Blossoms" embroidery collection for Brewer/OESD and her “Bonjour, Mon Ami” collection for Blend Fabrics are shown.

name: On the Go!
description: Whip up a modern, zippered pouch in no time using this simple pattern! This project makes a great gift and is a fun way to show off your favorite embroidery and experiment with different quilting motifs. Motifs shown are from Amanda's "Modern Blossoms" embroidery collection from OESD/Brewer. Fabrics are from her “Bonjour, Mon Ami” collection from Blend Fabrics, with coordinating Kona cotton in 21 Honey Dew and 1005 Aqua.

name: Blossoms
description: Blossoms is one of my most popular patterns.  It uses 2 layer cakes and measures 64-1/12'' x 82-1/2''.  If you make the flowers a little pointy it also makes a fun Christmas quilt!

name: Sunflower Row
description:
Sunflower Row is a full-color fat quarter-friendly pattern that uses 12 fat quarters and features Amanda's Bella line for Blend Fabrics. It can be easily expanded by making extra blocks and sashing units. 
 
Sunflower Row quilt measures 42” x 55-1/2”.

name: Fizz
description:
Fizz is a scrap-friendly pattern featuring the Seaglass color story from Amanda's Bella collection that is playful and fun to make. Try is with Cuddle or trapunto bubbles!

The baby-sized quilt measures 38” x 48-1/2”. Because the design is based on just one block, it is easy to adjust the design to any size.

name: Palace Doors
description:
Inspired by French architecture, Palace Doors is an elegant showcase for beautiful feature prints, in this case Amanda's Bella collection in the Seaglass color story. The full-sized quiilt measures 58" x 85". 

Directions for adjusting the measurements for a smaller wall hanging are also included.

name: Harlequin
description:
Harlequin is a scrap-friendly dynamic quilt design featuring Amanda's Bella collection for Blend Fabrics. It measures 50-1/2’’ x 74’’ and is deceptively simple to piece.  

Harlequin also uses Ruler the 22.5 ° Wedge Cut for the Cure™ by Nifty Notions® and Clover's Large Yo-Yo Maker#8701. (Both items are optional but highly recommended.)

name: Garden Paths
description: Garden Paths is a full-color roll-up-friendly pattern that measures 68'' x 96''.

name: Square Dance
description: Square Dance is a 69-1/2” x 93-1/2 full-color fat quarter-friendly pattern that uses 20 fat quarters with virtually no waste. Directions for a smaller quilt using 9 fat quarters are also included.

name: Cupcake Countdown
description:
Cupcake Countdown is a full-color scrap-friendly pattern that is like a fun birthday "advent" calendar. Each day you add a cherry to the top of a a cupcake in anticipation of the birthday to come. If
This wall hanging measures 21'' x 29''.

name: Garden Sampler
description: Garden Sampler is a quick-to-piece twin sized quilt design that is great for feature prints.  It measures 72-1/2” x 99-1/2” and incorporates oversized blocks and yo-yo accents.

name: Garden Jewels
description: Garden Jewels is a full-color vibrant and versatile pattern that makes great use of feature prints. At the center of each block is a coordinating solids, unifying the design.  It measures 82" x 94" and uses a 1/2 yard of 11 fabrics.

name: Cafe Mocha
description: Cafe Mocha is a deceptively simple strip-pieced pattern perfect for showcasing those modern prints. The quilt measures 64" x 87-1/2".

name: Caramel and Cocoa
description:
Caramel and Cocoa is Amanda's popular bargello design.  Its large scale makes it a great showcase for modern collections.!!! Plus, there are no seams to align.  
The quilt measures 63-1/2" x 86".

name: Beflowered
description: Beflowered is a bright and exhuberant design made using a combination of piecing and fusible applique and the 8” 60° Triangle Ruler from Creative Grids®. It measures 74” x 96”.

name: Bejeweled
description: Bejeweled is a great 72'' x 102'' twin-sized on-the-go project featuring lots and lots of yo-yos. A Clover Yo-Yo Maker makes this easy and fun! The quilt features fabric from Modern Whimsy, by Laurie Wishburn for Robert Kaufman Fabrics. Instructions for a smaller version using charm squares are also included.

name: Beribboned
description: Beribboned is a 74" x 94" full-color versatile pattern that is charm pack friendly! Just two block designs are used to give the illusion of ribbons cascading down this quilt!

name: Bedazzled
description: Bedazzled is a 62" x 86" unique interlocking design that is charm-pack friendly. Best of all - it is really simple to sew because it is based on just one block!

name: Portraits of My Garden
description: Portraits of My Garden is a full-color vibrant and versatile pattern that makes great use of feature prints.  It measures 69-1/2" x 90" and is super-easy to make because there are no seams to match!

name: Bubbles
description: The fun quilt measures 64" x 84" and is perfect for scraps!

name: Town Square
description: The fat-quarter quilt measures 73" x 88" and it is a great teaching piece as it is really a nine-patch within a nine-patch. The big quilt uses 20 fat quarters and the smaller version uses 12 fat quarters.  Directions for both are included.

name: Village Green
description: Village Green is a full-color roll-up-friendly pattern.  It uses two roll-ups and measures 84'' x 102'' so it is a perfect bed quilt!  Sew a little applique motif in the center of each block to unify the design.

name: Modern Blossoms
description:
This is my embroidery collection that is exclusive to Brewer Sewing that is featured in many of my patterns.  Patterns can be purchased 
It contains files in the following formats: .exp, .art, .pes, .pcs, . dst., .hus, .jef, .xxx, .sew, .vip., and .vp3.  You can use the free Explorations Sizer program that is included to rescale and convert art.
